newsitem.title: UK: BOE allots one bln stg in outright bills, repo.
newsitem.headline: BOE allots one bln stg in outright bills, repo.

text.p: The Bank of England said that it provided the UK money market with one billion stg of assistance after forecasting a liquidity shortage of 1.35 billion stg.
It allotted 19 million stg in bills maturing on or before August 18 and 981 million in 6.75 percent repos to August 18.
